div.p: This element, used only within AUTHORSUMMARY and normally containing at least a full sentence, will be particularly useful in summing up the careers of minor writers. Describe here the amount of a woman's writing (fifteen novels; only one text that survives; a diary over 60 years) and remember that this will be OUR view of the work. The AUTHORSUMMARY is attached to WRITING in entries, but displayed on the OVERVIEW screen. Because of this, it will likely form the first impression of the entry subject for many users. There are no allowable sub-elements or attributes for this element.

div.codeblock: Elizabeth Cellier's output amounts to three pamphlets on topical religious and gender issues.
